context.description: Sequence node Use the Sequence node to add a sequence number to one or more groups of input messages.
Properties navigator This displays the node properties. Configure the node by selecting the properties and setting their values. Mandatory properties are marked with an asterisk.

topic.label: Sequence node - Configuring the Sequence node

context.description: Description page If you want to describe the purpose of the node in the message flow, use these fields to enter a short description, a long description, or both.

topic.label: Sequence node - Configuring the Sequence node

context.description: Basic page Enter the name of the queue from which the message flow receives messages.

topic.label: Sequence node - Configuring the Sequence node

context.description: Advanced page Set properties that determine how messages are sequenced: for example, whether to store sequence state persistently.

topic.label: Sequence node - Configuring the Sequence node
